module.name: TrackerByFeatures
module.description: Track objects by matching a set of features (typically x,y,width and height)

param.name: auto_process
param.description: If yes the module processes with a timer at fixed fps, if no the module processes based on the time stamp of the input stream

param.name: allow_unsync_input
param.description: If yes the module accepts that its input can be on a different time stamp. Only relevant if the module has many inputs. Use at your own risks.

param.name: class
param.description: Class of the module (define the module's function)

param.name: time_disappear
param.description: Time before disappearence of an object [s]

param.name: symetric_match
param.description: Each match between objects and templates must be symetrical

param.name: features
param.description: List of features to use for tracking (only scalar values, must be present in objects to track)

param.name: alpha
param.description: Alpha for feature update, used to set the mean value dynamically. Sets the adaptibility of the tracker and is used to calculate mean and variation features.

param.name: handle_split
param.description: Handle the splitting of one object into multiple objects.
